## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G28710](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G28710)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATXIH, XIH</u>
- **Gene Name:** MYOSIN XI H
- **Description:**   Myosin family protein with Dil domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
